Starting the MIDI engine

The SongPlayer API needs an SPMIDI Context within which to play. You can create a SPMIDI Context using SPMUtil_Start(), as described in the ME2000 tutorial on playing notes.

	SPMIDI_Context *spmidiContext = NULL;

	result = SPMIDI_CreateContext( &spmidiContext, sampleRate );
	if( result < 0 ) handleErr();

If the function call is successful, result will be 0. In this case, your pointer to the context structure will be updated to point to a new SPMIDI context.
